actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight makes three Greatsword attacks, or it makes four Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Champion's Challenge
bonus_actions.desc: The knight challenges one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 CHA save or have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures that aren't the knight until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Chivalrous Presence
special_abilities.desc:
The knight exudes a powerful presence. At the start of each of the knight's turns, it chooses one of the following presences, which lasts until the start of the knight's next turn.
- **Empowering Presence.** Each friendly creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the knight has advantage on the first attack roll it makes before this presence ends.
- **Protective Presence.** Hostile creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against friendly creatures within 5 feet of the knight.
- **Unwavering Presence.** Each friendly creature within 15 feet of the knight is resistant to the charmed and frightened conditions.
